name: Authorize.Net CIM Payment Integration
long_description:
Founded in 1996, Authorize.Net has been one of the most sought-after payment gateways. The platform has earned the trust of almost half a million merchants worldwide for providing an affordable and secure payment solution. The Authorize.net offering includes recurring payments, added security features and free 24/7 support, for which they’ve earned the prestigious Ace Award for an impressive 11 years in a row.

The Authorize.net integration from PowerSync is a fully PCI compliant solution, which allows merchants to accept payments in Magento through the use of their platform. Securely accept payments using the Accept.js tokenization, credit cards are never entered or stored in Magento. The merchant is able to connect the Magento platform to a Test or Live Authorize.Net transaction gateway. When enabled and configured, your customers will be able to use all credit cards supported by the payment gateway. Your customers will also have an option to securely "save" their payment in the Authorize.Net payment gateway for faster checkout in the future. The PowerSync extension supports 3D Secure transaction validation if the customer's bank requires advanced level validation.

 

Account & Pricing

If you do not have Authorize.Net Merchant Account you will need to set one up prior to using this extension. Authorize.Net CIM (Customer Information Manager) service has no additional charges, however, see Authorize.Net pricing information for standard merchant fees required to use this transaction gateway service.

 

Features

  • Allow customers to re-use the same credit card for future orders.
  • Authorize or Authorize & Capture Invoice immediately, or upon shipment
  • Ability to test the integration with Authorize.Net Sandbox
  • Leverage Magento Vault capability for enhanced security
  • A flexible integration allowing you to filter out countries you wish to exclude from this integration
  • 3D secure support
  • Native integration with mPower, the #1 Subscription Management Solution for Magento.

 

Technical Details & Security

  • No actual credit card numbers are stored in Magento
  • A PCI compliant solution

 

Recurring Profiles & Subscription Support

For recurring payments and Subscription business model support, check out mPower, the most complete and flexible Subscription Management Solution for Magento.

mPower allows you to:

  • Manage all your subscription business needs in Magento – no platform hopping!
  • Give your customers a tailored experience by providing them with flexible options and billing frequencies
  • Designed to be customizable to fit your unique business processes
